snippet.title: Alone in the Dark Spotlight
snippet.description:
Return to the roots of survival horror in this Spotlight for Alone in the Dark! Illuminate the darkness and uncover the secrets of Derceto Manor, but proceed with caution.

Alone in the Dark is coming to PC, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.

- Alone in the Dark Prologue -
Steam: https://thqn.net/aitdp-steam
PSN Europe: https://thqn.net/aitdp-psne
PSN America: https://thqn.net/aitdp-psna
PSN Japan: https://thqn.net/aitdp-psnj
Xbox: https://thqn.net/aitdp-xbox

- Links & Info - 
Steam: https://thqn.net/aitd-steam
Website: https://aloneinthedark.com 
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/aloneinthedark

- Our Socials - 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AITDGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aloneinthedarkgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thqnordic 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic 

#AloneInTheDark #ReturnToDerceto
